# Zaporizhzhia fire {#sec-denial-zaporizhzhia}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
- Ukraine attacked the ZNPP with drones
- The IAEA proved that Kyiv lied about the fire at Zaporizhzhya Nuclear Power Plant
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=zaporizhzhya&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
- ZNPP was occupied by Russia and under Russia's control.
- Dark Smoke emerged from two cooling towers of ZNPP one day after Zelenskyy admitted Kursk. 
- The dark smoke indicates that russia has brought burnable Material into the cooling tower.
- The IAEA did not finde unburnt material in one tower and Russia denied the IAEA access to the other tower. 
:::
